Fun Commands:: hack  - `Hacks` a tagged user or word
8ball     - Ask a question for it to be answered!
Game Commands:: rps    - Plays rock-paper-scissors with the bot
fight    - **DISABLED** Starts a 'fight' with a tagged person
Utility Commands: temp   - Converts a given fahrenheit or celsius amount to the other unit
Miscellaneous Commands:: purge   - Deletes x amount of messages in the text-channel (requires `Manage Message` permission)
reload   - Attempts to reload either all cogs or a certain cog (requires `Admin` permissions)
botinfo   - Displays some information about Sentinel
changelog - Displays changes made to Sentinel
Mod Commands:: warn   - Warns a user (requires `Kick Members` permissions)
mute   - Mutes a user (requires `Kick Members` permissions)
unmute    - Unmutes a muted user (requires `Kick Members` permissons)
kick  - Kicks user from the server (requires `Kick Members` permissons)
ban   - Bans user from the server (requires `Ban Members` permissons)
unban    - Unbans a banned user from the server (requires `Ban Members` permissions)

changeLog.12/26/20:
**Added Utility Commands cog**
*Current commands: temperature converter (`.s temp`)*
Modified Rock-Paper-Scissors to send embeds instead of messages.
Removed the word 'asshole' from member leaving message.
Fixed the Goodbye GIF sending to the wrong channel glitch
changeLog.12/16/20:
Added Rock-Paper-Scissors game (.s rps), .s eatburger, .s kill, .s 8ball, .s cointoss
Added .s warn for admins
Goodbye message will now try to send to a text channel with goodbye in the name (if exists). Added gifs to hello/bye messages
changeLog.12/14/20:
**Added admin cog, with several new commands**
Shifted change log into a json file for ease of edit
Not entering an argument for .s help defaults it to short
Updated `purge` command to not include command message, also sends message when completed
Added 2 aliases for 'insult' command
changeLog.12/13/20:
Added `changelog` command
Added role requirement for `reload` and `purge` commands
